Newbie Helper:
Welcome. I want to give you one task. Gremlin's met in the vicinity? These bastards have stolen the precious Blue Gemstone, and fled.
Your task - to find him. To return the gemstone, you need to hunt for the Gremlin's.
Hover over the Gremlin and press the left button. The cursor changes to a sword. With the change of the cursor click the left mouse button and attack.
When you're done with it, I'll give you something useful as a gift. So, good luck.
